name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bugs Bunny: Fun and Adventure in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into Bugs Bunny’s playful world with lively animations and easy-to-use shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy the playful charm of Bugs Bunny in this dynamic theme featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.

Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the animated world of Bugs Bunny with lively and entertaining visuals.
Minimalist Design: A clean and cheerful interface inspired by Bugs Bunny’s mischievous personality.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance while enjoying Bugs Bunny’s antics.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites with ease.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add playful features to make your browsing experience more fun and engaging.
